Articles.Content:
Salutations.

Many of us now own land on Kerbin. In fact, there is no room left for the rest of you.

But now comes a true test at your worth of owning a nation:

Arrive there safely.

Be it by spaceplane, orbiter, or lander, arrive in your country and point out your approximate location on a map!

GO!

seriously unless you\'ve actually flown there before you\'ve 'claimed' it, then by law i think it has to be ruled invalid. all of it. all these claims are driving me batty because many of them don\'t give proof they\'ve even been there.

seriously unless you\'ve actually flown there before you\'ve 'claimed' it, then by law i think it has to be ruled invalid. all of it. all these claims are driving me batty because many of them don\'t give proof they\'ve even been there.

By what law?
point to the moon (or mars, or any planet in the galaxy), then call up the government, tell them you own it. Record the results and get back to me.

point to the moon (or mars, or any planet in the galaxy), then call up the government, tell them you own it. Record the results and get back to me.

And I would get the same response if I had landed there.

This comes from the olden days of earth exploration, where Columbus or other explorers went to new lands, planted a flag, and claimed them for their country. Of course, back then there was no orbital mapping so they really were discovering completely unknown land... and being total jack...things in the process of saying the people already there had no claim.

Given that both marking up the orbital view and landing there are equally silly ways of saying you own something, why not? I will begin by landing in the middle of Makavi and claiming it for the People! (dunno if you keep up with such things, my RP thread is that there\'s a populist rebel group that wants to overthrow all the governments and considers them all illigitimate oppressors.)

That is, I will do so as soon as the rebellion has assembled a working launcher. I\'m waiting for the sleeper agents in various organizations to supply me with parts.

Can\'t tell if sarcastic or trolling.

I claimed Kaledonia because it was my favourite landing spot!

I also used it as a means of gauging plane range.

Can\'t tell if sarcastic or trolling.

I didn\'t like all the land ownership stuff, but decided to fight it through RP of a socialist rebellion instead of just ignore it or complain about it. I decided it would also be against all the fancy titles and such that people were making up for themselves. But since this challenge has a huge crossover into the roleplay threads, let\'s go with the RP response...

The people will triumph! Down with the nobility/robber-barons/oligarchs/1%! (pick whichever applies in the current century and country)

Support the PDLKP and OCCUPY MAKAVI!

Booster-tron activate!

Umm... let me get back to you after someone smuggles me a strut or two.
My Kingdom\'s page has many up-close images of our nation. We\'ve flown all over it.
i managed to land on federation land with 1 fuel tank, 1 thruster, 1 parachute, 1 decoupler and 1 ASAS module...oh and the command module
